events.name: Annual Sports Day
events.description: Annual sports event featuring various athletic competitions and team games.

events.name: Science Exhibition
events.description: Showcasing science projects and experiments by students from different grades.

events.description: Meeting between parents and teachers to discuss students' progress and address concerns.

events.description: Displaying artwork and craft creations by students, showcasing their creativity and talent.
